entity.name: Interop issues
entity.description: Browser support issues, implementation bugs, cross‑browser implementation differences or inconsistencies, browser prioritization, speed of adoption of new features, any issues where specific browsers, browser engines, or browser companies are mentioned (and it’s not to praise them).
entity.descriptionHtml: Browser support issues, implementation bugs, cross‑browser implementation differences or inconsistencies, browser prioritization, speed of adoption of new features, any issues where specific browsers, browser engines, or browser companies are mentioned (and it’s not to praise them).
entity.descriptionClean: Browser support issues, implementation bugs, cross‑browser implementation differences or inconsistencies, browser prioritization, speed of adoption of new features, any issues where specific browsers, browser engines, or browser companies are mentioned (and it’s not to praise them).

entity.name: Apple
entity.description: Issues specific to Apple as a platform or vendor, and the Apple ecosystem (e.g., Safari, WebKit, iOS).
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues specific to Apple as a platform or vendor, and the Apple ecosystem (e.g., Safari, WebKit, iOS).
entity.descriptionClean: Issues specific to Apple as a platform or vendor, and the Apple ecosystem (e.g., Safari, WebKit, iOS).

entity.name: Safari browser
entity.description: Issues specific to the Safari browser, across all platforms.
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues specific to the Safari browser, across all platforms.
entity.descriptionClean: Issues specific to the Safari browser, across all platforms.

entity.name: Environments & Consumers
entity.description: Issues relevant to specific environments or consumers of web content, e.g. devices, bots, viewing modes, etc.
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues relevant to specific environments or consumers of web content, e.g. devices, bots, viewing modes, etc.
entity.descriptionClean: Issues relevant to specific environments or consumers of web content, e.g. devices, bots, viewing modes, etc.

entity.name: HTML Email
entity.description: Issues related to inconsistent or outdated HTML and CSS support in email clients, making it difficult to create reliable and modern email templates.
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues related to inconsistent or outdated HTML and CSS support in email clients, making it difficult to create reliable and modern email templates.
entity.descriptionClean: Issues related to inconsistent or outdated HTML and CSS support in email clients, making it difficult to create reliable and modern email templates.

entity.name: Printing
entity.description: Issues related to styling and controlling the printing of web pages, including paged media features.
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues related to styling and controlling the printing of web pages, including paged media features.
entity.descriptionClean: Issues related to styling and controlling the printing of web pages, including paged media features.

entity.name: HTML Reuse
entity.description: Pain points related to reusing and modularizing HTML content.
entity.descriptionHtml: Pain points related to reusing and modularizing HTML content.
entity.descriptionClean: Pain points related to reusing and modularizing HTML content.

entity.name: Templating & rendering
entity.description: Authoring and running templates, data binding, reactive rendering, Declarative Shadow DOM, and server boundaries. Also includes issues related to the <template> element.
entity.descriptionHtml: Authoring and running templates, data binding, reactive rendering, Declarative Shadow DOM, and server boundaries. Also includes issues related to the  element.
entity.descriptionClean: Authoring and running templates, data binding, reactive rendering, Declarative Shadow DOM, and server boundaries. Also includes issues related to the  element.

entity.name: Semantics
entity.description: Issues related to understanding, choosing, and correctly using semantically appropriate HTML elements.
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues related to understanding, choosing, and correctly using semantically appropriate HTML elements.
entity.descriptionClean: Issues related to understanding, choosing, and correctly using semantically appropriate HTML elements.

entity.name: Excessive complexity
entity.description: The landscape or technology feels overengineered, overcomplicated, making it hard to get started.
entity.descriptionHtml: The landscape or technology feels overengineered, overcomplicated, making it hard to get started.
entity.descriptionClean: The landscape or technology feels overengineered, overcomplicated, making it hard to get started.

entity.name: Poor learnability
entity.description: High learning curve, requires too much knowledge to get started, or too much information to memorize.
entity.descriptionHtml: High learning curve, requires too much knowledge to get started, or too much information to memorize.
entity.descriptionClean: High learning curve, requires too much knowledge to get started, or too much information to memorize.

entity.name: Excessive verbosity / Boilerplate
entity.description: APIs being overly verbose and/or requiring too much boilerplate.
entity.descriptionHtml: APIs being overly verbose and/or requiring too much boilerplate.
entity.descriptionClean: APIs being overly verbose and/or requiring too much boilerplate.

entity.name: Reliance on JavaScript
entity.description: Lack of declarative APIs, slow rendering due to dependence on correct loading & execution of JS, issues around the higher barrier-to-entry of JS APIs, etc.
entity.descriptionHtml: Lack of declarative APIs, slow rendering due to dependence on correct loading & execution of JS, issues around the higher barrier-to-entry of JS APIs, etc.
entity.descriptionClean: Lack of declarative APIs, slow rendering due to dependence on correct loading & execution of JS, issues around the higher barrier-to-entry of JS APIs, etc.

entity.name: Ecosystem
entity.description: Ecosystem issues, poor discoverability, poor marketing.
entity.descriptionHtml: Ecosystem issues, poor discoverability, poor marketing.
entity.descriptionClean: Ecosystem issues, poor discoverability, poor marketing.

entity.name: Framework Dominance
entity.description: Pain points arising from the dominance of specific JavaScript frameworks, leading to a monoculture, abstracting away platform features, and making it difficult to use or advocate for HTML-first approaches.
entity.descriptionHtml: Pain points arising from the dominance of specific JavaScript frameworks, leading to a monoculture, abstracting away platform features, and making it difficult to use or advocate for HTML-first approaches.
entity.descriptionClean: Pain points arising from the dominance of specific JavaScript frameworks, leading to a monoculture, abstracting away platform features, and making it difficult to use or advocate for HTML-first approaches.

entity.name: Framework compatibility
entity.description: Issues around compatibility with JS frameworks.
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues around compatibility with JS frameworks.
entity.descriptionClean: Issues around compatibility with JS frameworks.

entity.name: Educational issues
entity.description: Lack of awareness, poor docs, lack of best practices, lack of good examples. This is about the availability and quality of educational resources, not about learnability issues instrinsic to the technology (use `poor_learnability` for that).
entity.descriptionHtml: Lack of awareness, poor docs, lack of best practices, lack of good examples. This is about the availability and quality of educational resources, not about learnability issues instrinsic to the technology (use poor_learnability for that).
entity.descriptionClean: Lack of awareness, poor docs, lack of best practices, lack of good examples. This is about the availability and quality of educational resources, not about learnability issues instrinsic to the technology (use poor_learnability for that).

entity.name: Accessibility
entity.description: Obstacles in providing accessible experiences (regardless of cause), assistive‑tech compatibility, etc.
entity.descriptionHtml: Obstacles in providing accessible experiences (regardless of cause), assistive‑tech compatibility, etc.
entity.descriptionClean: Obstacles in providing accessible experiences (regardless of cause), assistive‑tech compatibility, etc.

entity.name: Poor design
entity.description: Fidelity issues that are outside the developer’s control or API limitations making it hard to produce high-fidelity results. E.g. rendering is too low quality, low dpi, blurry, browser-generated UI is poor or ugly, etc.
entity.descriptionHtml: Fidelity issues that are outside the developer’s control or API limitations making it hard to produce high-fidelity results. E.g. rendering is too low quality, low dpi, blurry, browser-generated UI is poor or ugly, etc.
entity.descriptionClean: Fidelity issues that are outside the developer’s control or API limitations making it hard to produce high-fidelity results. E.g. rendering is too low quality, low dpi, blurry, browser-generated UI is poor or ugly, etc.

entity.name: Rendering
entity.description: General issues related to the browser's process of painting pixels on the screen, including layout, style recalculation, and compositing.
entity.descriptionHtml: General issues related to the browser's process of painting pixels on the screen, including layout, style recalculation, and compositing.
entity.descriptionClean: General issues related to the browser's process of painting pixels on the screen, including layout, style recalculation, and compositing.

entity.name: Performance
entity.description: Throughput, latency, memory, jank, lag, frame drops, battery/thermal, and loading time.
entity.descriptionHtml: Throughput, latency, memory, jank, lag, frame drops, battery/thermal, and loading time.
entity.descriptionClean: Throughput, latency, memory, jank, lag, frame drops, battery/thermal, and loading time.

entity.name: Styling and UI customization
entity.description: Issues around styling and customizing browser-generated UI.
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues around styling and customizing browser-generated UI.
entity.descriptionClean: Issues around styling and customizing browser-generated UI.

entity.name: Styling
entity.description: Issues around styling UA-generated UI, CSS not working in certain contexts, etc.
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues around styling UA-generated UI, CSS not working in certain contexts, etc.
entity.descriptionClean: Issues around styling UA-generated UI, CSS not working in certain contexts, etc.

entity.name: Missing elements
entity.description: The need to build common UI patterns from scratch due to the lack of built-in, accessible HTML elements.
entity.descriptionHtml: The need to build common UI patterns from scratch due to the lack of built-in, accessible HTML elements.
entity.descriptionClean: The need to build common UI patterns from scratch due to the lack of built-in, accessible HTML elements.

entity.name: Vendor politics
entity.description: Pain points arising from the strategic decisions, priorities, or market position of browser vendors or platform owners (e.g. Apple, Google).
entity.descriptionHtml: Pain points arising from the strategic decisions, priorities, or market position of browser vendors or platform owners (e.g. Apple, Google).
entity.descriptionClean: Pain points arising from the strategic decisions, priorities, or market position of browser vendors or platform owners (e.g. Apple, Google).

entity.name: Web Components
entity.description: Pain points related to authoring and using Web Components (Custom Elements, Shadow DOM, etc.).
entity.descriptionHtml: Pain points related to authoring and using Web Components (Custom Elements, Shadow DOM, etc.).
entity.descriptionClean: Pain points related to authoring and using Web Components (Custom Elements, Shadow DOM, etc.).

entity.name: Declarative APIs
entity.description: Complaints about lack of declarative APIs (combine with `limitations`), or current declarative APIs (as a whole) being hard to use (combine with `ergonomics`).
entity.descriptionHtml: Complaints about lack of declarative APIs (combine with limitations), or current declarative APIs (as a whole) being hard to use (combine with ergonomics).
entity.descriptionClean: Complaints about lack of declarative APIs (combine with limitations), or current declarative APIs (as a whole) being hard to use (combine with ergonomics).

entity.name: PDF
entity.description: Embedding and generating PDFs in/with the web platform.
entity.descriptionHtml: Embedding and generating PDFs in/with the web platform.
entity.descriptionClean: Embedding and generating PDFs in/with the web platform.

entity.name: Security & privacy
entity.description: Threats, mitigations, permissions, and fingerprinting/privacy budget concerns, cross-origin issues etc. Pain points related to general concerns about security and privacy on the web.
entity.descriptionHtml: Threats, mitigations, permissions, and fingerprinting/privacy budget concerns, cross-origin issues etc. Pain points related to general concerns about security and privacy on the web.
entity.descriptionClean: Threats, mitigations, permissions, and fingerprinting/privacy budget concerns, cross-origin issues etc. Pain points related to general concerns about security and privacy on the web.

entity.name: Tooling
entity.description: Issues around third party tools, or lack thereof, including tooling in the browser (extensions, devtools, etc.).
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues around third party tools, or lack thereof, including tooling in the browser (extensions, devtools, etc.).
entity.descriptionClean: Issues around third party tools, or lack thereof, including tooling in the browser (extensions, devtools, etc.).

entity.name: Workplace issues
entity.description: Issues around getting one’s workplace to agree on certain policies and/or priorities.
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues around getting one’s workplace to agree on certain policies and/or priorities.
entity.descriptionClean: Issues around getting one’s workplace to agree on certain policies and/or priorities.
